div.p: Hi. I'm Zach. I'm a treasury solutions analyst here with the Commercial Real Estate Banking group at Bank of America.
Here at the bank in the Commercial Real Estate Banking group, we offer two products to our clients. We offer a credit product that allows clients to buy property.
And then, what I do is when we work with those credit clients to manage their cash and their liquidity for all commercial real estate banking.
The reason it’s exciting to work here at the bank for me is I had always been focused on real estate throughout my undergraduate career.
Here at the bank, I'm able to look at that from a completely new perspective and develop new skills and ideas that I have never really had before in my real estate background.
The people that have helped me along the way here at the bank were my manager and my mentor while I was first in the analyst program.
They took the time to learn who I am as a person and that really helped me develop my skills.
The group atmosphere here at the bank is great. I really developed close relationships with all of the analysts in my program.
And even though we're out of the program now, I still talk to them to this day to develop not just my knowledge but friendships and networking opportunities as well.
Bank of America is a great place to give someone right out of undergraduate an opportunity to grow into a career and not just a job.

The bank, in general, really provides opportunities for all kinds of individuals in all facets of business to grow and develop skill sets needed to not just function in a job environment, but develop and build a successful career as well.
The advice that I could give to an undergraduate interested in the commercial real estate banking program is to think of this as a way to develop your career.

Not just as a job out of college. Because that’s what this opportunity is. It’s a very unique, exciting opportunity that gives you ways to grow and succeed in commercial real estate that not a lot of other places are able to do.
There’s so many different opportunities and jobs that you can take here at the bank that it’s really the sky is the limit.
